short_description: This function generates predictions on a response variable for a data set
long_description: This function uses a decision tree model from the forest_drive to create predictions on a response variable for a test set

input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input test data.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the model data.

argument_clauses.name: Forest
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the table containing the decision forest generated by the Forest_Drive function

argument_clauses.name: ModelFile
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the file containing the trained model generated by the Forest_Drive function

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies a column containing a unique identifier for each test point in the test set

argument_clauses.name: NumericInputs
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns that contain the numerical predictor variables

argument_clauses.name: CategoricalInputs
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns that contain the categorical predictor variables

argument_clauses.name: Detailed
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to output more detailed information about the forest trees The default value is false.
